name: untitled (baseline zero)
description:
Temperature projections from human induced climate change are made from a baseline date. Reliable records have only been available back to the 1800's and so dates around then are taken as the base. 
This article - https://www.carbonbrief.org/analysis-when-might-the-world-exceed-1-5c-and-2c-of-global-warming has a discussion on the variability of measurements and date estimates.
